name: Annelie-memory
description: Memory NFT of Annelie by Neura

attributes.value: Annelie's early life was scarred by war and loss. Orphaned and homeless, she learned to survive alone. Her resilience and curiosity kept her going. Adopted at age six by a kind couple, she finally found warmth and stability. Her bond with a white dog named Sunny brought her constant comfort. She began drawing to express herself, using art to navigate her emotions and rebuild trust in the world.
